topics.body:
Here's some good news: There's some news on the gay marriage front; five states on august ninth will have their court hearings all at once and will be decided upon.  What's more is that there's a lot of the appeals court dates coming up.  Texas and two other cases will have their opening brief started July ninth, and the plaintiff brief will be due within thirty days; no set hearing date though.

So basically almost three more weeks till Texas' brief starts, a month for filing it, possibly a month until the court date and possibly up to a month for a ruling to be made.  So anywhere between two to four months until gay marriage is legal in Texas.  Let's hope they don't try to stall it out.
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a50c966368725aeda50000#post_53a50c966368725aeda50000
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a50c116368725b77760000#post_53a50c116368725b77760000
Awwww uc-kun. I still love you.[/bq]
I know; I was talking about Vargus shitposts, not you.

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a509be6368723820240600#post_53a509be6368723820240600
There are 60,000 miles of blood vessels that fill my body. If the word hate was engraved in every nucleotide of every gene of every chromosome of every nucleus of every cell of those tens of thousands of miles, it would not equal one-one billionth of the hate I feel for you at this micro-instant. For _you_. Hate. Hate. Hate.
